# Execution Gate Checklist

Use this skill before committing to a major milestone or release phase.

## Required gate checks

1. Scope and acceptance stability
2. Dependency and critical-path viability
3. Risk mitigation readiness
4. Ownership clarity for pending actions
5. Recovery/fallback plan for top risks

- [Gate checklist template](./templates/gate-checklist.md)
